summary: Corin Nemec (Mansquito, SS Doomtrooper) co-stars alongside Carpenter as TV ghost hunters that enter a reportedly haunted house that may prove to be the death of them.
cast: Charisma Carpenter|Marcus Lyle Brown|Ricky Wayne|Collin Galyean|Kyle Clements|Corin Nemec|Stephanie Honor√©|Gregory Campo|Jake Austin Walker|William Adam Scott|Joe Chrest|Antonino Paone|John 'Jo' Mosley|Hillary Holland|Edrick Browne|Erica Fox|Wil Philip|Brandon Kihl|Jared Wilcox
director: Director: Jeffery Scott Lando (as Jeffery Lando)
title: House of Bones
